text: Teach Formation: Infantry
The finest instructors you can find shall whip your footsoldiers into shape.
The finest instructors you can find shall whip your footsoldiers into shape.
Teach Formation: Cavalry
Veterans of the Tiger and Leopard riders are on hand to organise and prepare your horsemen.
Veterans of the Tiger and Leopard riders are on hand to organise and prepare your horsemen.
Forced Recruitment
The menfolk of every village, every town, every prefecture are commanded by law to fulfil their military duties to defend the Empire.
The menfolk of every village, every town, every prefecture are commanded by law to fulfil their military duties to defend the Empire.
Forced Movement
In battle, swiftness is key to victory. Any man who cannot keep up with the march shall be punished as per military law.
In battle, swiftness is key to victory. Any man who cannot keep up with the march shall be punished as per military law.
Arrow Production
Resources will be allocated to collect arrows and bolts for your armies. Let every quiver bulge, and let the skies blacken with a rain of missiles.
